caption.center: LINDA CORREIA v. WILLIAM J. IRONS.

opinion.posture: Motion of petitioner for leave to file petition for certiorari denied.
opinion.attorneys:
Richard J. Israel, Attorney General, Alexander G. Teitz, Special Asst. Attorney General, for State of Rhode Island.
Cary J. Coen, Rhode Island Legal Service, for petitioner, William J. Irons.
